value: A number of other beaches including the nearby coves at Mikro Amoudi (or Amoudaki) are easily reached.  Strong swimmers can pass between the two coves by swimming through the under water arch or round the pinnacle that divides them.

If you want to avoid crowds, just five minutes away by car in the town of Myrthios on the hill-side, you will find some family-run apartments and tavernas.  The

value: content=The “Village Apartments” built in 1998, are located in the beautiful mountain village of Mirthios, southern Crete, although the family business started out in 1978 in the then small fishing village of Plakias. There are 7 apartments altogether, all with magnificent sea views of Plakias Bay. Our apartments can accommodate 2 – 6 persons, and each apartment has separate bedrooms consisting of double or single beds, bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen that has everything you need. The living room is spacious and perfect for relaxing in.
